player.name: Patrick Ewing
player.physicalDescription: 7'0" center, muscular imposing frame, intense eyes, always glistening with sweat, intimidating presence
player.archetype: King of New York who never won the crown, always overshadowed by Jordan

figure.name: Saul
figure.attributeDescription: heavy golden crown of Israel's first king, spear that he threw at David in jealous rage
figure.clothing: royal robes befitting Israel's first king, armor beneath, crown that weighs heavily
figure.physicalDescription: tallest man in Israel, head and shoulders above others, dark brooding eyes, handsome but haunted features
figure.anatomyNote: two arms, often holding spear or seated with crown
figure.archetype: First king of Israel who watched helplessly as David took his place

connection.thematic: Both wore the crown but watched someone else become the true king
connection.narrative: Both wore the crown. Both watched someone else take it.
connection.relationship: Tragic kings overshadowed by the ones who came after

interactions.description: Two tragic kings, unable to face what they've lost
Ewing watching Jordan while Saul watches David
Standing tall together - the height, the crown, the tragedy
